system.description:
You send a jolt of electric energy a target you can see within range, dealing 90% Air Damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.Y7nT6W1vQGzOCVwm]{Shocked} (Resisted by Magic Armor)

You torment the mind and body of a creature you can see within range, setting them ablaze and filling their mind with terrifying visions.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning} and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.gVlbuZ3CMlbP1qRN]{Psychosis} (Resisted by Magic Armor).

You strike at target creature within melee range with your dagger, dealing 100% weapon damage and disarming them.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.ApravHaqi2H9tSn2]{Atrophied} (Resisted by Physical Armor)

★ Can Backstab

A cleansing veil of water encapsulates target creature you can see within range, restoring 150% HP. This also removes @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.znf7Y4pFLUGRvbO2]{Diseased}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.hzPIPV1YdkdkSBHS]{Decaying}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.pwMjhiGe1Q35osEy]{Poisoned}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.YGJz1dn22aKAq9ZA]{Oily}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.f9EgHLBdEVJ70oGg]{Bleeding}.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.dEgPZYUDoDHpl72H]{Wet}
You place two copper coins over the eyes of a creature. For 10 days the affected creature's corpse doesn't age and it can't become undead.

You strike with your bow at a creature. The shot does 120% damage and maims the target.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.X6IszAPOszReXljl]{Maimed} (Resisted by Physical Armor)

You exhale a cone of psionic force from your mouth, dealing 75% Psychic Damage to each creature in a 15-foot cone.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.tUIK3QRY3bhGjHsg]{Dazed} (Resisted by Magic Amor).
Send a bolt of energy from your staff to Strike a target within range.

Sanguine clouds appear above a point on the ground you can see within range and droplets of blood pour down in a 15-foot radius around that point, causing enemies to bleed.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.f9EgHLBdEVJ70oGg]{Bleeding} (Resisted by Physical Armor)

Thousands of icy hands wrap around target creature you can see within range. The target takes 100% Water damage as they're overwhelmed by fear.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.jZ7bYqFX2qfNWzwz]{Chilled} and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.AwXMsQK5LQUAmsV2]{Terrified} (Resisted by Magic Armor)

You reach out to touch a creature within melee range. The target takes 100% Air damage and is made suffocating and silenced.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.7wfkn72lnRhuwnk4]{Suffocating} and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.I9RkvpW5qGPRkeuv]{Silenced} (Silenced blocked by Magic Armor)

You send a short message, no more than 25 words, to a creature of your choice. If the creature isn't on the same plane of existence as you, there is a 5% chance for the skill to fail. The creature hears the message in your voice, and understands its meaning as long as it understands a language.

you open a creature's eyes to the untold horror that is the void. Choose a creature you can see within range. The target takes 100% Psychic damage and is overcome by mania.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.tUIK3QRY3bhGjHsg]{Dazed} (Resisted by Magic Armor).

A shroud of divine water envelops a creature you can see within range, fully restoring their magic armor and removing harmful effects from them.

★ Removes @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.OaOL5lw8fBtJDTz5]{Frozen}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.X7VhbdyKmLC7jiN3]{Stunned}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.c4XtON9HzTtFXuO7]{Petrified}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.znf7Y4pFLUGRvbO2]{Diseased}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.7wfkn72lnRhuwnk4]{Suffocating}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.pwMjhiGe1Q35osEy]{Poisoned}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.YGJz1dn22aKAq9ZA]{Oily}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.frCQo2l5BX8ljsNV]{Spiritfire}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.AwXMsQK5LQUAmsV2]{Terrified}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.I9RkvpW5qGPRkeuv]{Silenced}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.0rJCQrvNUPq3scYd]{Mad}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.tUIK3QRY3bhGjHsg]{Dazed}
A rush of adrenaline overcomes you. You gain 2 Action Points this turn, but you restore 2 fewer at the start of your next turn.

Slamming your weapon into the ground, creating a shockwave in a 15-foot cone. Each enemy in the shockwave takes 65% of your Weapon Damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.m4Sd3wSukc9j0o3h]{Prone} (Resisted by Physical Armor)

With a single strike you demolish your target. Make a weapon attack against a target that deals 175% damage. Then, if your current Physical Armor is higher than the target's, destroy the target's remaining armor.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.m4Sd3wSukc9j0o3h]{Prone} (Resisted by Physical Armor)
You make a weapon attack against an enemy within range, dealing 100% weapon damage.

You send a bolt of poisonous energy at target creature you can see within range. The target takes 100% poison damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.pwMjhiGe1Q35osEy]{Poisoned} (Resisted by Magic Armor)
You leap into the air and strike down at your target with an arrow with increased range and damage. Your shot deals 115% damage and has 120-foot range.

Touching a wet blood, you reveal information of its source. The blood reforms on the surface into a unique pattern to the creature it belonged to. This pattern is not enough for you to tell who it belonged to on its own, but comparing multiple patterns allows you to confirm they belonged to the same creature. The pattern also provides enough information to garner the kind of creature the blood belonged to.

Hammering your fist into the earth you cause a fissure to form in a 60-foot line. Each creature in the line when the fissure forms takes 150% Earth damage and is knocked down.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.m4Sd3wSukc9j0o3h]{Prone} (Resisted by Physical Armor).

You send a psionic wave, crushing the psyche of all creatures in a 60-foot cone. Each creature takes 175% Psychic damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.tUIK3QRY3bhGjHsg]{Dazed} (Resisted by Magic Armor)

Cleanse the wounds of target creature you can see within range. The target heals for 100% Healing and is Patched Up.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.NwtfEYxqaHPYil8K]{Patched Up} (Removes Maimed, Atrophied, Blinded, Prone, Bleeding, Diseased, and Silenced)

You equalize the vital resources of all creatures within a 15-foot radius of a point you can see within range. The HP and Armor percentages of each creature (with more than 0 current hp) are summed up and then distributed equally.

Bolts of lightning arc out from your form to any number of target creatures within a 45-foot radius of you. Each target takes 100% Air damage and is shocked.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.Y7nT6W1vQGzOCVwm]{Shocked} (Resisted by Magic Armor)

You fire a dart at target creature you can see within range. The target takes 100% Magic Armor damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.zD4uj511KZiI0LRA]{Asleep} (Resisted by Magic Armor).

★ Using this skill doesn't remove invisible.
You swing your weapon around you, Striking each enemy in a 10-foot radius around you for 100% Weapon Damage. Roll a separate attack for each creature.

You perform a 1 hour ritual and touch a creature that has been dead for no more than a century and died for any reason other than old age. The creature returns to life with all resources.

The ritual heals all wounds and cures/neutralizes any poisons or diseases afflicting the creature. It also lifts any curses or other harmful magical effects affecting the creature. It replaces / regrows any missing limbs, organs, or bones. If the creature was undead, it is no longer.

Additionally, the ritual can create a new body if the creature's original body no longer exists. If the creatures body no longer exists, you must speak the creature's name aloud and their new body will appear in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of you.

components.materialFull: A diamond worth at least 2500 GP

system.description:
You call upon otherworldly powers to beguile a creature you can see within range.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.AOX1crEpU3tbBybY]{Charmed} (Resisted by Magic Armor)
Your blood turns to liquid metal and your skin is coated in steel. You gain 100% Temp Physical Armor now and 75% at the start of your turn for 3 rounds.

You send out a telekinetic shockwave that hits each creature of your choice within a 30-foot radius. Each affected creature takes 80% Psychic damage and is knocked 10 feet away from you.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.m4Sd3wSukc9j0o3h]{Prone} (Resisted by Physical Armor)

You summon a magical, invisible, force at a point you can see within range. The force can lift and manipulate objects as though it were a humanoid and it obeys your verbal commands. The force lasts until you dismiss it, it moves more than 30 feet away from you, or you use this skill again.

In a wisp of shadows you teleport to target point you can see within 60 feet.

★ Using this skill doesn't remove invisible.

You send ripples through the ground in a 20-foot cube originating at your location, leaving an oily surface behind. Each creature touching the ground in the radius takes 100% Earth damage and is knocked over.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.m4Sd3wSukc9j0o3h]{Prone} (Resisted by Physical Armor).
With a gust of magical wind you teleport a creature you can see within range to a point you can see within range (grounded creatures are unaffected).

You strike your target with extra precision, making a weapon attack and dealing 140% damage on a hit. This skill does an additional 35% (multiplicative) damage if you are hiding or invisible when you make the attack.

You magically beguile a creature you can see within range for 1 minute. For the duration, you have advantage on all influence checks made to interact with them.

After the duration, the target knows they were charmed and will likely be hostile.

Once you target a creature with this skill, they are immune to it being used by you for 24 hours.

You create a 10-foot radius dome of force around you and it remains there for 8 hours. The dome is opaque from the outside and can be any color you choose as you use this skill. When the dome is created, choose any number of creatures to be able to freely walk in and out of the dome, any creatures inside the domes radius as it is created also are able to freely enter or exit. Apprentice and Novice tier skills and their effects cannot pass through the dome.

The dome comfortably fits 8 medium sized creatures. The inside of the dome is comfortable and dry and you can command it to cause the interior to shift between dim light and darkness.

The dome vanishes early if you leave it.

You call forth 4 nature spirits that take the form of a draft animal of your choice that appear at points you can see within range. The steeds persist for 8 hours, enough for one day of travel, or until their hp is reduced to zero. The steeds have 1 hit point and cannot engage in combat.

The steeds allow you to travel roughly 25% faster than you would be able to travel by foot.
Target character you can see within range becomes @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.ceeb9gugKrD3PqSI]{Hasted}

For 10 minutes, you are able understand all written and spoken languages and ciphers. This does not grant you any special ability to communicate. This does not automatically cause you to understand the construction of a cipher.
You let out a bellowing roar, dealing 110% Physical Damage to each creature in a 20-foot radius.

You open a temporary rift to the void. A star-filled blackness envelops a 15-foot radius sphere originating at a point you can see within range and lingers for 2 turns. Each creature in the sphere as it appears takes 100% Psychic damage. Any creature that enters the area is overcome by madness.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.0rJCQrvNUPq3scYd]{Mad} and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.gVlbuZ3CMlbP1qRN]{Psychosis} (Resisted by Magic Amor)
Grant target creature you touch vampiric power. The affected creature gains 50% life steal for 2 rounds.

Autumn leaves wisp around you as you teleport to a point you can see within 60 feet and become hasted.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.ceeb9gugKrD3PqSI]{Hasted}
With a flex of your muscles you grow to double your size for 3 rounds. For the duration, you gain +3 Warlord and your reach is increased by 5 feet.

You slash at your target, making an attack that deals 110% Weapon damage and incites a wound-induced panic.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.f9EgHLBdEVJ70oGg]{Bleeding} and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.AwXMsQK5LQUAmsV2]{Terrified} (Bleeding resisted by Physical Armor, Terrified resisted by Magic Armor)

★ Can Backstab

You magically grant yourself the ability to understand all spoken languages for 1 hour. For the duration all creatures understand your words in a language they understand. This doesn't grant creatures the ability to understand you if they don't already understand one language.

You commune with nature and are able to magically sense the most direct physical route to a location you are familiar with. For 24 hours, as long as you are on the same plane as your destination, you know its exact distance and direction. If you face any crossroads on your journey, you always know which one is the most direct.
Teleport behind target creature you can see within range and Strike it. On a hit, this attack is always a critical hit.

One of your appendages transforms into a tentacle that you use to lash out at a creature within range, dealing 125% Physical damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.ApravHaqi2H9tSn2]{Atrophied} (Resisted by Physical Armor)

You knock on the surface of a locked object and a loud knocking sound can be heard up to 300 feet away. If the target is held shut by a nonmagical lock, it becomes unlocked, unstuck, or unbarred. If it has multiple locks, this only unlocks one, you choose which one. If the target is locked by an @UUID[Compendium.celestus.skills.c3DorrjqY8qWRE6Z]{Arcane Lock}, the effect of the lock is suppressed for 10 minutes.

Using this, you gain the ability to communicate with animals for 1 hour, understanding their squeaks and gestures, and they understand your words. This skill doesn't give any extra intelligence to the animals, so what they can communicate may be limited.
Choose two characters you can see within range. Those characters swap places (cannot target grounded creatures).

You summon a torrent of icy hail in a 30-foot cylinder centered on a point you can see within range. Each creature in the cylinder takes 300% Water damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.jZ7bYqFX2qfNWzwz]{Chilled} (Resisted by Magic Armor).

You summon a hail of fiery destruction in a 30-foot cylinder centered on a point you can see within range. Each creature in the cylinder takes 300% Fire damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning} (Resisted by Magic Armor).
Lightning courses through the veins of target creature you can see within range. The target's evasion is increased by 90% and their movement is increased by 20% for 2 rounds.

Choose a Adept Tier or lower non-focus skill that you have memorized that can target yourself or only affect yourself (the contingent skill). You invoke the skill as part of using this skill but its effects don't occur immediately, instead they occur when a specified trigger occurs. You define some trigger as you use this skill to active the contingent skill. For example, if you might stipulate that a contingent deepsight takes effect when you enter a dark room.

The contingent skill occurs immediately after the trigger occurs for the first time, whether or not you will it in that moment, and the contingency ends.

The contingent skill can only affect you, even if it normally could target or affect other creatures. You can only have one contingency active at a time. If you use this skill again, your other contingency ends. Additionally, your contingency ends if this skill's material component is ever not on your person.

components.materialFull: A figurine of your likeness worth at least 1500 GP

system.description:
You lash out with a flurry of stabs and slashes, attacking target creature 6 times with your daggers, each strike dealing 65% Weapon Damage.

★ Can Backstab

You send tremors through the ground in a 60-foot radius, damage and knocking down enemy creatures within range. Has no effect on flying creatures.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.m4Sd3wSukc9j0o3h]{Prone} (Resisted by Physical Armor)
You grant 8 creatures of your choice within range the ability to breath underwater for 24 hours.
You throw your shield and it bounces off of up to two creatures within range, both within 30 feet of each other, before returning to you. You deal 75% Physical Damage to each creature.
You can move a distance equal to twice your movement speed (you must take this entire movement at once).

You sling a orb of flame at a point you can see within range and then erupts into a ball of flame, leaving a fiery surface in its wake. Each creature within a 15-foot radius of that point takes 100% Fire Damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning} (Resisted by Magic Amor).

Deathly smoke swirls around a point you can see within range in a 15-foot radius, suffocating and blinding those within. The smoke lingers for 2 rounds or until dispersed by strong winds.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.7wfkn72lnRhuwnk4]{Suffocating} and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.1CbPWoPQr2EW4pzF]{Blinded} (Blinded resisted by Magic Armor)

You forge a temporary telepathic link between yourself and up to 5 other willing creatures within range. For 1 hour, each affected creature is able to communicate with each other telepathically so long as they are on the same plane of existence.

You open a gateway to another world. The portal can be a circle or square opening between 10 and 20 feet in size. You can cause the portal to appear in any orientation and it lasts for 1 minute or until you dismiss it (no action required).

The portal has a front face and creatures can only travel through its front. If a creature travels through the portal, it appears in the nearest unoccupied space.

Some powerful creatures, especially those who hold power over a plane of existence, can prevent a gate from being opened near them or within their domain.

When you use this skill, you can instead speak the true name of a creature and cause a portal to open beside that creature, so long as it is on a different plane of existence, and pull that creature through the portal, placing it beside you. A creature transported this way has no special allegiance towards you.

components.materialFull: A gem encrusted tuning for worth at least 5000 GP

system.description: Fire three shots from your weapon, each dealing 60% Damage. Roll a separate attack for each shot.

A bolt of electric energy sprouts from your hand to target creature you can see within range. You may then have it bounce to up to six other creatures of your choice within 30-feet of that creature. Each target hit by the lightning takes 150% Air damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.Y7nT6W1vQGzOCVwm]{Shocked} (Resisted by Magic Armor)

You conjure a torrent of boulders from the sky striking each hostile creature within 60 feet of you. As they impact each creature, they create an oil surface in a 5-foot radius around that creature and do 300% to each creature within their radius. A creature can be struck by multiple boulders from the skill.

You fire a ray of solar energy, damaging and burning all creatures in its path. Each creature in a 100-foot line takes 150% Fire Damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning} (Resisted by Magic Amor).
Make one powerful Strike that does 140% weapon damage.

Fire erupts from you and explodes in a 20-foot radius. Each creature within the explosion (including yourself) takes 175% Fire Damage.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning} (Resisted by Magic Amor).

You become invisible as you create an illusory copy of yourself. The illusion lasts for 1 hour, or until you dismiss it, but the invisibility only lasts until you use a combat skill or otherwise attempt to interact physically with a creature.

For the duration, you can control the illusion, make it gesture, speak in your voice, etc. The illusion is both intangible and invulnerable. You can choose to sense through the illusion as though you were in its space.

You execute a deadly flourish of your daggers that deals 140% weapon damage, doubled if you are hiding or invisible when you make the attack. If the target drops below 20% Vitality, they instantly die.

This skill can only be used once per combat.

★ Can Backstab

After performing a 1 hour ritual, you take a willing tiny animal to be your familiar, which has the following benefits:

  • Although its intelligence is not increased by this, you can effectively communicate and understand your familiar's thoughts.

  • As long as you and your familiar are within 1 mile of each other, you can communicate telepathically with it and.

  • You can spend 1 action point to shunt it to a pocket dimension, and spend 1 action point to summon it from its pocket dimension to a point you can see within 30 feet.

  • Your familiar shares your level (this doesn't mean it can learn abilities and skills like you do).

You can only have one familiar bound at a time.
You make a single shot with your weapon that deals more damage as it travels. Make a Strike that does 5% more damage for each 5 feet your target is away from you.
You focus your pyrokinetic might on a creature you can see within range. The target takes 75% Fire Damage, and then takes another 100% Fire Damage if they're affected by Burning or Spiritfire.

You reveal secrets about the recent history of a location. All footprints and fingerprints within a 45-foot radius of a point you touch faintly glow for 10 minutes. As you use this skill, choose a period of time that has occurred in the past 10 days. Each unique creature's prints glow a single color.

You take on a temporary divine mantle. For 2 rounds your skills cost 3 less focus points.

This skill can only be used once each combat.

You cause yourself and up to 5 other creatures you can see within range to magically become invisible for 1 hour. The invisibility ends for a creature if it deals damage or uses a combat skill (unless that skill specifies otherwise).

A creature made invisible by this effect makes no sound from moving for as long as they remain invisible.

With a word, your form is bathed with light. You shine bright light in a 15 foot radius for 2 rounds. Each enemy within a 15-foot radius of you when the light appears takes 90% Air Damage. For the duration, any enemy that enters the light is blinded and you have gain +50% Air Resistance.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.1CbPWoPQr2EW4pzF]{Blinded by Radiance} (Resisted by Magic Armor)
You bite down on a creature within reach using your vicious maw. Make a attack against them, dealing 100% Piercing damage on a hit and healing you for 50% of the damage you deal.

You throw your knife at target creature within range. Make a strike against that creature and deal your weapon damage as Physical damage.

★ This skill can backstab

Electrified mist pours out from you into a 15-foot radius and lingers for 1 round, dealing 225% Air Damage to each creature within the mist. You gain 100% Air resistance and immunity to shocked and stunned for 2 rounds.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.Y7nT6W1vQGzOCVwm]{Shocked} (Resisted by Magic Armor)
For 10 minutes, or until you end this effect, no sound can pass through a 20-foot radius centered on a point you can see within range.

You summon a storm of thundering wrath, causing bolts of lightning to strike each creature within a 30-foot radius cylinder of a point you can see within range, exploding a 5-foot radius. Each explosion does 100% Air damage to each creature within its radius. A creature can be struck by multiple explosions of this skill.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.Y7nT6W1vQGzOCVwm]{Shocked} (Resisted by Magic Armor)

★ Channels for 2 turns.

Attempt to hide from enemies. Make a Scoundrel check with Dexterity. The difficulty of this check is increased by the number of enemies who have line of sight on you:

  • An enemy you have no-cover from increases the difficulty by 100

  • An enemy you have half-cover from increases the difficulty by 50

  • An enemy you have three-quarters cover from increases the difficulty by 25

Undead limbs reach out from the ground attacking all enemies within range that are standing over a blood surface, dealing 200% Physical damage and crippling them.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.X6IszAPOszReXljl]{Maimed} (Resisted by Physical Armor)

A powerful wind whips up in 15-foot radius, 20-foot tall cylinder centered on a point you can see within range. Each creature within the radius takes 75% Air damage. All surfaces touching the are cleared, all invisible creatures are made visible, and all burning, oily, or slowed creatures have those statuses removed.

★ Removes @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.9qo7qdEF3hIuvsXr]{Slowed}, @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.YGJz1dn22aKAq9ZA]{Oily}, and @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.brQHLcMCTNNXxgGL]{Invisible}.

You perform a 1-hour ritual that allows you to learn all significant lore about a person, place, or object, as described by the GM. The lore might include important details, widespread knowledge, or even secrets that have never been recorded.

The more information you know about the target before you cast it, the more information you will gain from using this skill.

If the target is not sufficiently legendary, the ritual fails.

components.materialFull: 500 GP of incense and ivory strips, which the skill consumes

system.description:
You provide a psionic shield to a creature you can see within range, protecting them from harmful statuses for 2 rounds.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.5WnOnUhH4LYfPLlZ]{Burning} (Resisted by Magic Amor).

You send a blast of dusty air at target creature you can see within range, dealing 75% Earth damage and blinding them.

★ Sets @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.1CbPWoPQr2EW4pzF]{Blinded} (Resisted by Magic Armor)

You take on a disguise, changing your appearance to look like that of another creature. For 1 hour, your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings take on a new, superficial form. You must take on a form that has the same general arrangement of limbs and you cannot make yourself appear more than 1 foot taller or shorter.
You grant yourself and nearby allies uncanny agility. For 2 rounds each ally within a 30-foot radius of you gains +90% evasion and +20% movement.

Each creature of your choice within a 30-foot radius gains a bonus to all their primary attributes based on their level.

Divine Ward: Choose a creature type amongst Fiend, Fey, Undead, Celestial, and Aberration. Creatures of the chosen type can't willingly enter the are and creatures affected by statuses generated by creatures of that type have those statuses suppressed while they're within the area.

Divine Alteration: Choose one of the following additional effects

  • Determination: Creatures within the area cannot be made @UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.AwXMsQK5LQUAmsV2]{Terrified} or@UUID[Compendium.celestus.rules.0rJCQrvNUPq3scYd]{Mad}

  • Dark: The area is flooded with magical darkness, non-magical light cannot illuminate the area and unless it comes from an Expert tier or higher skill.

  • Light: Magical sunlight fills the area magical darkness cannot extinguish the light unless it comes from a Expert tier or higher skill.

  • Gentle Repose: Corpses in the area cannot be made undead.

  • Transportational Block: Creatures of any types you choose are unable to teleport into the area.

  • Immune: Creatures within the +100% Resistance to one damage type of your choice while within the area.

You perform a 1 hour ritual that causes a temple to spring into existence at a point on the ground you can see within range. The temple must fit into unoccupied space within an 150-foot cube. The temple remains for 24 hours.

You decide the temple's appearance, including: how/if it is lit, the temperature, as well as how many windows it has. The temple is enclosed by a floor, walls, and a roof, and is secured by a single door that can only be opened by any creatures you choose to allow as you perform this ritual. Creatures cannot teleport into the temple unless you specifically allow them to as part of the ritual.

You can cause the temple to ward off particular types of creatures. Choose any from among the following, Aberrations, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead. Warded creatures cannot enter the temple by any magical or nonmagical means.

Additionally, effects such as the Scrying skill cannot be created within the temple and creatures within the temple cannot be targeted similar skills.

The temple is made of solidified magical energy, but can appear however you so choose. This magical energy extends into the shallows and similar half-dimensions.

Performing the ritual on the same spot every day for a year makes its effects permanent.

You can also communicate a message of up to 25 words. The animal travels for one day in an attempt to deliver your message, traveling up to 25 miles on land, or 50 miles if it can fly.

If the animal reaches its destination, it delivers your message with your voice and tone. If the animal doesn't reach its destination, your message is lost and the animal returns to where you cast the spell.

You touch a corpse and imbue it the ability to temporarily speak. The corpse must have a mouth.

For 10 minutes, you are able to ask the corpse up to 5 questions. The corpse only has any knowledge it had in life. Answers may be cryptic, repetitive, untruthful, or otherwise unhelpful as the corpse has no natural compulsion towards truthfulness.

The corpse can't learn new information or comprehend events that have happened since its death.

Rain clouds appear above a point on the ground you can see within range and rain pours down in a 30-foot radius below the clouds, making creatures wet, until three rounds pass or they are dispersed by a strong wind.

You change the locus of an environmental effect, natural or otherwise. Move target contiguous surface from one location in range to another point you can see.

You conjure a swarm of bloodsucking flies around target creature you can see within range. The target takes 100% Physical Damage and you heal equal to the amount of damage dealt.

Roll a [[/r d100]] and consult the table below based on your familiarity with the place.

Familiarity is how familiar you are with the place and determines the rate of success.

  • Doesn't Exist: This location does not physically exist or is not on the same plane of existence as you.

  • Heard of: You have either heard of this place or otherwise know of its existence.

  • Seen: You have seen this place, either physically or by magical means such as scrying.

  • Visited: You have personally been to this place before.

  • Familiar: You have been to this place many times and are intimately familiar with it.

  • Can See: You can currently physically see the location you are attempting to teleport to.

  • Object: You have an object that has been taken from the location some time in the past 6 months.

Mishap: Some sort of magical disaster takes place as you attempt to teleport causing the spell to fail. Each target (including yourself) gains 2 levels of exhaustion.

Similar Location: You teleport to some location that matches a similar description but is not your actual destination.

Off Target: You teleport to a location that is near your target but some distance away. The location you teleport to is determined by the GM rolling two d10 and multiplying the results. That number is the percentage of the total distance meant to be traveled the target is off target by. For example, if you were teleporting 50 miles, and the GM rolled a 4 and 6, you would arrive 24%, or 12 miles off target. The direction should be determined randomly by the GM.

Success: You arrive at your destination unharmed.
You throw a dagger at each creature within a 30-foot radius of you. Make a weapon attack against each creature within range, dealing 125% weapon damage on a hit. These attacks can backstab.

Icy armor forms around target creature you can see within range. The target gains 100% Temp Magic Armor and is Soothed.

Make three Strikes against one target, each doing 45% weapon damage.

You cause a magical door to appear at a point you can see within range that lasts for 24 hours. The door leads to a pocket-dimension that houses a dwelling brought up by your imagination. The door can be up to 10 feet in height and width. When you use this skill you can choose any number of creatures to be allowed to freely enter through the door. While you are within 30 feet of the door you can cause it to open or close without using an action. While the door is closed, it can't be perceived by any means.

Beyond the door lies a dwelling that matches whatever you fancy. The dwelling's atmosphere can be any that you choose, but it isn't cold enough or hot enough to cause any damage or otherwise adverse effects.

You can create any floor plan you choose but it's volume can't exceed 100,000 cubic feet. The mansion is decorated and furnished however you choose and contains enough food to luxuriously serve 100 people. Objects created by this skill exploded into a harmless cloud of mist if they are removed from the dwelling.

The mansion is staffed by 100 spectral servants who attend to any who enters the mansion. You determine the appearance of the servants and any attire they have. The servants are immune to all damage and statuses. The servants can perform any tasks a standard humanoid would be able to perform, but they cannot harm another creature.

When the skill ends you can choose to either have any objects left inside be left inside the mansion, waiting until the skill is used again, or expelled safely to an unoccupied space nearest to the door's previous location.

components.materialFull: A silver spoon worth at least 5 GP

system.description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see through all darkness. For the next 12 hours, that creature can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 60 feet.

You siphon the blood out of each living creature in a 30-foot cube originating from a point you can see within range. Each creature in the cube takes 300% Physical damage as their blood leaves their body.

You produce an illusion at point you can see within range. The illusion can be both auditory and visual, but its visuals must be contained entirely within a 20-foot cube and its sound is not loud enough to cause damage.

You can control the image for 1 action point and move it, animating it as it moves.

The illusion does not hold up to physical inspection.

You perform a 10 minute ritual that can allow you to peer in on a creature or place.

If you are attempting to scry on a creature, roll a [[/r 1d100]] to determine your success. You need to roll a 50 or higher, but the roll can be modified (see attached tables) by your familiarity with the target or any physical connection you have. If the skill fails, the target is unaware that you tried to spy on them, but they feel a general sense of unease wash over them.

Your knowledge of the target:

You have heard of the target

-20

+0

+20

A picture or other likeness

+10

+15

+40

If you succeed, you create an invisible sensor within 10 feet of the target. You can see and hear through the sensor as if you were there. The sensor follows the target, remaining within 10 feet of it for 1 hour, after which it disappears. If something can see the sensor, it appears as a white sphere.

If you targeted a location, the sensor does not move.

Leap towards target creature you can see within range and strike them with your weapon for 70% Damage. You may then leap to another target within 10 feet of the first, striking them as well. Roll an attack for each target.

A minor sandstorm whips up in a 10-foot radius sphere centered on a point you can see within range. Each enemy within the sphere takes 100% Earth damage and is blinded.

You create an illusion of some visual and/or auditory phenomenon that comes into effect when a specified condition occurs. The condition must be some auditory or visual condition that is objective. For example, "when an ally enters within 5 feet" wouldn't work, but "when a creature wearing royal regalia enters" would.

The illusion itself can fill up to a 30-foot cube and last up to 5 minutes. You choose the appearance of the illusion and can cause it to animate in any way you choose as you use this skill. After the illusion's duration has elapsed it disappears and remains dormant for 5 minutes, after which it can be activated again.

The illusion itself doesn't hold up to physical investigation as any creature or object that would touch it instead passes through.

Mark target creature you can see within range for 5 rounds. While that creature is marked in this way you always know where it is located and it cannot benefit from invisibility against you.

You cannot use this skill if there is another creature you have marked with it that is alive.

A passageway appears at target point you can see on a non-metallic surface you can see within range. The passageway lasts for 1 hour. You choose the dimensions of the passageway: it can be up to 5 feet wide, 10 feet tall, and 20-feet deep. A passage created this way doesn't cause any structural instability in the surfaces surrounding it.

When the passageway disappears, any creatures inside are safely ejected to the nearest edge.

You summon a powerful downward gust centered on a point you can see within range damaging creatures, dispersing clouds, and dousing all flames in a 20-foot radius. Each enemy within the radius takes 70% Air Damage.

You perform a 1-minute log ritual that allows you to magically commune with a divine entity. You may ask 3 questions, each must be a yes or no and you will receive a correct answer.

Divine beings are not necessarily omniscient and you may receive "unclear" as an answer if you ask a question the entity is unable to answer. If a one-word answer would be misleading / opposed to the entity's interests, the GM may have them answer with a short phrase.
